select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.register_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.device_name , t1.device_category , t1.tech_incharge , t1.project_director , t1.single_or_set , t1.set_count , t1.budget_price , t1.financial_estimate , t1.financial_resources , t1.belong_project , t1.project_no , t1.simple_or_large , t1.install_position , t1.is_satisfy_bearing , t1.has_outdoor_unit , t1.is_allow_outdoorunit , t1.has_foundation , t1.use_voltage , t1.has_voltage_condition , t1.has_humidity_need , t1.humidity_need , t1.has_cleanliness_need , t1.cleanliness_need , t1.has_water_need , t1.water_need , t1.has_gas_need , t1.gas_need , t1.has_let_need , t1.let_need , t1.has_other_need , t1.other_need , t1.has_above_conditions , t1.supplementary_notes , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_ustdregister_proc t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.REGISTER_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.registerNo}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByTel}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
and t1.TECH_INCHARGE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.techIncharge}),'%')
and t1.PROJECT_DIRECTOR like concat(concat('%',#{bean.projectDirector}),'%')
and t1.SINGLE_OR_SET like concat(concat('%',#{bean.singleOrSet}),'%')
and t1.SET_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.setCount}),'%')
and t1.BUDGET_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.budgetPrice}),'%')
and t1.FINANCIAL_ESTIMATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.financialEstimate}),'%')
and t1.FINANCIAL_RESOURCES like concat(concat('%',#{bean.financialResources}),'%')
and t1.BELONG_PROJECT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.belongProject}),'%')
and t1.PROJECT_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.projectNo}),'%')
and t1.SIMPLE_OR_LARGE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.simpleOrLarge}),'%')
and t1.INSTALL_POSITION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.installPosition}),'%')
and t1.IS_SATISFY_BEARING like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isSatisfyBearing}),'%')
and t1.HAS_OUTDOOR_UNIT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasOutdoorUnit}),'%')
and t1.IS_ALLOW_OUTDOORUNIT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isAllowOutdoorunit}),'%')
and t1.HAS_FOUNDATION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasFoundation}),'%')

and t1.HAS_VOLTAGE_CONDITION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasVoltageCondition}),'%')
and t1.HAS_HUMIDITY_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasHumidityNeed}),'%')

and t1.HAS_CLEANLINESS_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasCleanlinessNeed}),'%')
and t1.CLEANLINESS_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.cleanlinessNeed}),'%')
and t1.HAS_WATER_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasWaterNeed}),'%')
and t1.WATER_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.waterNeed}),'%')
and t1.HAS_GAS_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasGasNeed}),'%')
and t1.GAS_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.gasNeed}),'%')
and t1.HAS_LET_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasLetNeed}),'%')
and t1.LET_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.letNeed}),'%')
and t1.HAS_OTHER_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasOtherNeed}),'%')
and t1.OTHER_NEED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.otherNeed}),'%')
and t1.HAS_ABOVE_CONDITIONS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasAboveConditions}),'%')
and t1.SUPPLEMENTARY_NOTES like concat(concat('%',#{bean.supplementaryNotes}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_25 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute25}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.register_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.device_name , t1.device_category , t1.tech_incharge , t1.project_director , t1.single_or_set , t1.set_count , t1.budget_price , t1.financial_estimate , t1.financial_resources , t1.belong_project , t1.project_no , t1.simple_or_large , t1.install_position , t1.is_satisfy_bearing , t1.has_outdoor_unit , t1.is_allow_outdoorunit , t1.has_foundation , t1.use_voltage , t1.has_voltage_condition , t1.has_humidity_need , t1.humidity_need , t1.has_cleanliness_need , t1.cleanliness_need , t1.has_water_need , t1.water_need , t1.has_gas_need , t1.gas_need , t1.has_let_need , t1.let_need , t1.has_other_need , t1.other_need , t1.has_above_conditions , t1.supplementary_notes , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_ustdregister_proc t1 where t1.id = #{id}

insert into assets_ustdregister_proc
id,
register_no,
created_by,
created_by_dept,
created_by_tel,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,

belong_project,
project_no,
simple_or_large,
install_position,
is_satisfy_bearing,
has_outdoor_unit,
is_allow_outdoorunit,
has_foundation,
use_voltage,
has_voltage_condition,
has_humidity_need,
humidity_need,
has_cleanliness_need,
cleanliness_need,
has_water_need,
water_need,
has_gas_need,
gas_need,
has_let_need,
let_need,
has_other_need,
other_need,
has_above_conditions,
supplementary_notes,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
